title: Disbursement of funds
context: ยง54-62 Disbursement of funds. All moneys expended by the board of water supply pursuant to this part shall be disbursed by the county treasurer on vouchers signed by the chairperson or acting chairperson of the board. [L 1949, c 86, ยง12; RL 1955, ยง146-111; HRS ยง54-62; gen ch 1993]
